toast.fastquit.title: FastQuit done!
options.fastquit.showToasts.description: Determines whether a toast gets shown when a world finishes saving.
options.fastquit.backgroundPriority.desc:
Sets the thread priority of the server when saving worlds in the background.
This is done to improve client performance while saving, but will make the saving take longer over all.
modmenu.summaryTranslation.fastquit: Return to the Title Screen while the world is still saving!
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.fastquit: This mod lets you return to the Title Screen early while your world is still saving in the background.
